alert.note: Alert for Crowley County; Eastern Las Animas County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 5:22PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Otero, eastern Huerfano, northwestern Las Animas, southeastern Crowley and southeastern Pueblo Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 522 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ordway to 12 miles southwest of Manzanola to 9 miles southeast of Greenhorn Mountain. Movement was south at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Rocky Ford and Walsenburg around 535 PM MDT. Swink around 540 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include La Junta, North La Junta, Aguilar and Gulnare. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
